languages.text: {n}Головы Блаженных были безжалостно вскрыты, и в разумы их внедрили сдерживающие энграммы, гарантирующие, что никакой вредоносный приказ не будет исполнен этими покорными существами.{/n}
{n}The heads of the Touched were opened, and inhibiting engrams were implanted within to ensure that these obedient creature would follow no malicious commands.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Головы Блаженных были безжалостно вскрыты, и в разумы их внедрили сдерживающие энграммы, гарантирующие, что никакой вредоносный приказ не будет исполнен этими покорными существами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The heads of the Touched were opened, and inhibiting engrams were implanted within to ensure that these obedient creature would follow no malicious command.{/n}

{n}The heads of the Touched were opened, and inhibiting engrams were implanted within to ensure that these obedient creature would follow no malicious commands.{/n}

languages.text: {n}受召者的头颅被打开，抑制印记被植入其中，确保这些顺从的生物不会听从恶意的命令。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heads of the Touched were opened, and inhibiting engrams were implanted within to ensure that these obedient creature would follow no malicious commands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}受召者的头颅被打开，抑制印记被植入其中，确保这些顺从的生物不会听从恶意的命令。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se abrieron las cabezas de los Tocados y se implantaron en ellas programas inhibidores para garantizar que estas obedientes criaturas no siguieran órdenes maliciosas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heads of the Touched were opened, and inhibiting engrams were implanted within to ensure that these obedient creature would follow no malicious commands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se abrieron las cabezas de los Tocados y se implantaron en ellas programas inhibidores para garantizar que estas obedientes criaturas no siguieran órdenes maliciosas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}触れられし者の頭部を開き、これらの従順な生き物が悪意のある指揮に従わないようにするため、抑制エングラムが埋め込まれた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heads of the Touched were opened, and inhibiting engrams were implanted within to ensure that these obedient creature would follow no malicious commands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}触れられし者の頭部を開き、これらの従順な生き物が悪意のある指揮に従わないようにするため、抑制エングラムが埋め込まれた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après leur avoir ouvert le crâne, des engrammes inhibiteurs sont implantés dans le cerveau des Altérés serviles afin de les empêcher d'obéir à des ordres malveillants.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heads of the Touched were opened, and inhibiting engrams were implanted within to ensure that these obedient creature would follow no malicious commands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après leur avoir ouvert le crâne, des engrammes inhibiteurs sont implantés dans le cerveau des Altérés serviles afin de les empêcher d'obéir à des ordres malveillants.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Köpfe der Berührten wurden aufgeschnitten und hemmende Engramme wurden ihnen implantiert, damit diese gehorsamen Kreaturen keine bösartigen Befehle befolgen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heads of the Touched were opened, and inhibiting engrams were implanted within to ensure that these obedient creature would follow no malicious commands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Köpfe der Berührten wurden aufgeschnitten und hemmende Engramme wurden ihnen implantiert, damit diese gehorsamen Kreaturen keine bösartigen Befehle befolgen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mütehassislerin hiçbir menfur komuta uymadıklarından emin olmak için itaatkâr yaratıkların kafaları açılarak içlerine engelleyici bellekler yerleştirildi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heads of the Touched were opened, and inhibiting engrams were implanted within to ensure that these obedient creature would follow no malicious commands.{/n}
